content.raw:
Still error at branch gazebo_1.9 which is used on OS X homebrew environment.
I rebuilt sdformat using hg (branch: sdf_2.0).

What should I do to build successfly?

This is log of building gazebo (this is part of it because of long log.)

```bash
4270:usr/local/Cellar/boost/1.57.0/include/boost/type_traits/detail/has_binary_operator.hp:50: Parse error at "BOOST_JOIN"
4271:make[2]: *** [gazebo/gui/moc_QTestFixture.cxx] Error 1
4272-make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
4273-/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/usr/bin/make -f gazebo/gui/CMakeFiles/UNIT_MainWindow_TEST.dir/build.make gazebo/gui/CMakeFiles/UNIT_MainWindow_TEST.dir/depend
4274:usr/local/Cellar/boost/1.57.0/include/boost/type_traits/detail/has_binary_operator.hp:50: Parse error at "BOOST_JOIN"
4275:make[2]: *** [gazebo/gui/moc_DataLogger_TEST.cxx] Error 1
4276-/usr/local/Cellar/cmake/3.1.0/bin/cmake -E cmake_progress_report /tmp/gazebo-gJy7n5/build/CMakeFiles
4277:make[1]: *** [gazebo/gui/CMakeFiles/UNIT_DataLogger_TEST.dir/all] Error 2
4278-make[1]: /usr/local/Cellar/cmake/3.1.0/bin/cmake -E cmake_progress_report /tmp/gazebo-gJy7n5/build/CMakeFiles
4279-*** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
--
4290-[ 97%] Generating moc_MainWindow_TEST.cxx
4291-cd /tmp/gazebo-gJy7n5/build/gazebo/gui && /usr/local/Cellar/qt/4.8.6/bin/moc @/tmp/gazebo-gJy7n5/build/gazebo/gui/moc_MainWindow_TEST.cxx_parameters
4292:usr/local/Cellar/boost/1.57.0/include/boost/type_traits/detail/has_binary_operator.hp:50: Parse error at "BOOST_JOIN"
4293:make[2]: *** [gazebo/gui/moc_QTestFixture.cxx] Error 1
4294-make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
4295-/usr/local/Cellar/cmake/3.1.0/bin/cmake -E cmake_progress_report /tmp/gazebo-gJy7n5/build/CMakeFiles
--
4301-/usr/local/Cellar/cmake/3.1.0/bin/cmake -E cmake_progress_report /tmp/gazebo-gJy7n5/build/CMakeFiles
4302-[ 97%] Built target SphereAtlasTestPlugin
4303:usr/local/Cellar/boost/1.57.0/include/boost/type_traits/detail/has_binary_operator.hp:50: Parse error at "BOOST_JOIN"
4304:make[2]: *** [gazebo/gui/moc_MainWindow_TEST.cxx] Error 1

4306-Linking CXX shared library libSpringTestPlugin.dylib
4307-cd /tmp/gazebo-gJy7n5/build/plugins && /usr/local/Cellar/cmake/3.1.0/bin/cmake -E cmake_link_script CMakeFiles/SpringTestPlugin.dir/link.txt --verbose=1
--
4320-/usr/local/Cellar/cmake/3.1.0/bin/cmake -E cmake_progress_report /tmp/gazebo-gJy7n5/build/CMakeFiles
4321-[ 97%] Built target gazebo
```
